txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Aiding the Eastemnet will cancel this quest</rgb>

'The uruks from the south are preparing to march upon this town once more. I can see the vile catapults rolling out of their encampment as we speak.

'This town cannot withstand much more punishment. Their siege-weapons must be dismantled, or we will not have a town left to defend.

'Join me on the battlefield, and we shall defend what is ours.'
'The destruction of those catapults should delay the next assault for several days... a valuable amount of time to rest and rebuild.'
'Are you ready to defend Eaworth?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>
The uruks' catapults rain fire and destruction down upon the town of Eaworth.
Catapults can be found among the enemy forces at Eaworth.\n\nThe catapults being used by the uruks assaulting Eaworth must be destroyed if the town is to be secured.
Dernstan is at Eaworth.\n\nDernstan will be pleased to hear that you have dismantled several catapults.
